abstract.text: Creates a session for decompressing video frames.

abstract.text: Work directly with hardware-accelerated video encoding and decoding capabilities.
A reference to a decompression session.
Creates a session for decompressing video frames.
Decompresses a video frame and invokes the output callback when the decompression completes.
A reference to a CFAllocator object.
A reference to an immutable dictionary object.
A type you use to interact with video format descriptions.
A pointer for accessing data of a specific type.
A pointer for accessing and manipulating data of a specific type.
